title: FREE DOWNLOAD: I don’t want to go to sleep (In English)
text:
FREE DOWNLOAD: I don’t want to go to sleep (In English)

Join Nandi as she lets her imagination run wild and free. Download the story in English here.

Nandi doesn’t want to go to sleep. No way! She wants to go on an adventure.

Join Nandi as she lets her imagination run wild and free.

This story is brought to you by Book Dash, a local organisation that gathers creative volunteers to create new African storybooks that anyone can freely print, translate and distribute.

Created bySarah McGregor (writer), Subi Bosa (illustrator) and Alexia Greef (designer) and edited by Anna Stroud.

Sign up to Parent24 newsletter to be notified of new bedtime stories for kids:
